contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of May, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 587 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid filings improper). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filings to counsel of record.
